thread.title: Bart Samaduroff
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by Bart Samaduroff

author: Bart Samaduroff
title: Bart Samaduroff
text: Your staff was very efficient and capable group. At all phases of the process, people took the time and effort to not only speed the process where available, but also took the time to explain the steps, and how they progressed. I bought this boat thru PopYachts, and sold this boat thru PopYachts, and most likely the next one will be from here also. Great job guys!
